question: [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: ChangeOrganizationProposerWhiteList()] [Member-Proposer Mismatch] Can new whitelist contain only non-members, creating scenario where no member can propose, deadlocking governance? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: AddMember()] [Member Count Threshold] When adding member at line 237, can new member count violate ProposalReleaseThreshold invariants checked in Association_Helper.cs lines 72-80? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: AddMember()] [Duplicate Addition] Does Validate() at line 238 prevent adding duplicate members via AnyDuplicate check, or can same address be added multiple times if state update races occur? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: AddMember()] [Retroactive Voting] Can newly added member immediately vote on existing proposals, potentially changing approved status retroactively? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: AddMember()] [Authorization Bypass] At line 235, can attacker manipulate Context.Sender to be organization address without going through proper proposal release process? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: AddMember()] [Threshold Violation] After adding member, can (MaximalAbstentionThreshold + MinimalApprovalThreshold) exceed new member count, violating invariant at Association_Helper.cs line 77-78? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: AddMember()] [Null Address Addition] Does Validate() prevent adding null or zero addresses as members, or can invalid addresses be added breaking voting logic? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: ChangeMember()] [Atomic Operation Failure] If Remove at line 252 succeeds but Add at line 254 fails validation, is organization left in inconsistent state with one fewer member? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: ChangeMember()] [Active Voter Replacement] Can old member be replaced while they have active votes on proposals, causing their votes to be counted for non-member? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: ChangeMember()] [Remove Validation] Does line 253 assert removeResult, but can removal fail silently if oldMember voted on proposals, causing state inconsistency? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: ChangeMember()] [Duplicate Replacement] Can newMember already exist in OrganizationMembers before ChangeMember, with AnyDuplicate check failing only after oldMember is removed? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: ChangeMember()] [Self-Replacement Attack] Can member replace themselves with another address they control, effectively getting fresh voting rights on existing proposals? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: RemoveMember()] [Member Count Underflow] After removing member at line 270, can member count drop below MinimalVoteThreshold, making all future proposals unapprovable? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: RemoveMember()] [Threshold Invariant] After removal, can (MinimalApprovalThreshold > remaining member count) occur, violating invariant at Association_Helper.cs line 72? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: RemoveMember()] [Active Proposal Impact] Does removing member at line 270 invalidate their existing votes on active proposals, or do votes persist causing non-member votes to count? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: RemoveMember()] [Proposer-Member Dependency] Can removed member still be in ProposerWhiteList, allowing non-members to create proposals? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: RemoveMember()] [Removal Failure Handling] At line 271, if removeResult is false, does assert prevent state update, or can function proceed with failed removal? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: RemoveMember()] [Last Member Removal] Can organization remove all members, leaving empty OrganizationMemberList that violates Empty() check in Validate()? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: ClearProposal()] [Timing Attack] At line 286, can attacker front-run proposer's Release() call with ClearProposal() immediately after expiry, preventing legitimate proposal execution? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: ClearProposal()] [Anyone Can Clear] Does 'anyone can clear' at line 284 allow malicious actors to DOS governance by clearing proposals immediately upon expiry before release? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: ClearProposal()] [Expired Proposal Release Race] Between ExpiredTime check at line 286 and Remove at line 287, can proposer still Release() if release check occurs before ClearProposal? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: ClearProposal()] [Storage Cleanup DOS] Can attacker spam proposal creation then use ClearProposal to repeatedly churn storage, causing excessive gas costs for nodes? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: IsReleaseThresholdReached()] [Rejection Count Logic] At Association_Helper.cs line 36-38, does Count() include non-member rejections if member was removed after voting, causing incorrect rejection threshold calculation? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: IsReleaseThresholdReached()] [Abstention Priority] At Association_Helper.cs line 30-31, if both rejection and abstention thresholds are exceeded, which takes precedence, or can conflicting states exist? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Association/Association.cs] [Function: IsReleaseThresholdReached()] [Vote Count Filtering] At Association_Helper.cs line 49, does filtering approvals by OrganizationMemberList.Contains prevent counting removed member votes, or can timing allow invalid counts? (High)
